statements: UPSERT INTO biometric_data (id, user_id, fingerprint, timestamp) VALUES (1, 1001, 'fingerprint1', '2021-10-20 10:00:00')
UPSERT INTO user_info (user_id, name, age, gender) VALUES (1001, 'John Doe', 30, 'Male')
UPSERT INTO biometric_data (id, user_id, fingerprint, timestamp) VALUES (2, 1002, 'fingerprint2', '2021-10-21 11:00:00')
UPSERT INTO biometric_data (id, user_id, fingerprint_data) VALUES (1, 101, 'fingerprint1')
UPSERT INTO user_data (user_id, username, age) VALUES (101, 'JohnDoe', 30)
UPSERT INTO device_data (device_id, user_id, device_name, fingerprint_scanner_version) VALUES (1, 101, 'Device1', 'v1.0')

UPSERT INTO UserBiometrics (id, username, fingerprint, face_scan) VALUES (1, 'john_doe', 'random_fingerprint_data', 'random_face_scan_data') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET username = 'john_doe', fingerprint = 'updated_fingerprint_data', face_scan = 'updated_face_scan_data';
UPSERT INTO HeartRateData (id, user_id, rate, time) VALUES (1, 1, 80, '2022-01-01 08:00:00') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET user_id = 1, rate = 80, time = '2022-01-01 08:00:00';

UPSERT INTO BloodPressureData (id, user_id, systolic_pressure, diastolic_pressure, date) VALUES (1, 2, 120, 80, '2022-01-01') ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET user_id = 2, systolic_pressure = 120, diastolic_pressure = 80, date = '2022-01-01';

INSERT INTO users (user_id, full_name, age, gender, height, weight) VALUES (1, 'Alice Johnson', 25, 'Female', 165.5, 55.7) ON CONFLICT (user_id) DO UPDATE SET full_name = 'Alice Johnson', age = 25, gender = 'Female', height = 165.5, weight = 55.7

INSERT INTO fingerprints (fingerprint_id, user_id, fingerprint_data, timestamp) VALUES (1, 1, 'fingerprint_binary_data_1', '2022-08-15 08:30:00') ON CONFLICT (fingerprint_id) DO UPDATE SET user_id = 1, fingerprint_data = 'fingerprint_binary_data_1', timestamp = '2022-08-15 08:30:00'

INSERT INTO iris_scans (iris_scan_id, user_id, iris_data, timestamp) VALUES (1, 1, 'iris_binary_data_1', '2022-08-15 08:35:00') ON CONFLICT (iris_scan_id) DO UPDATE SET user_id = 1, iris_data = 'iris_binary_data_1', timestamp = '2022-08-15 08:35:00'
